vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract with Halff Associates, Inc., to provide additional engineering design services and necessary design modifications of 10th Street from Interstate Highway 35 to Clarendon Drive to avoid impact to the cemetery at 100 North Moore Street - Not to exceed $134,500.00, from $290,165.40 to $424,665.40 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
